overview: A white youth who is raised in the jungle by the animals is captured by a safari and brought back to civilization as an attraction in a circus.
tagline: Chaos Riding Rampant in a Raging Stampede of Lions, Tigers, Elephants, Apes...Charging Busses, Smashing Stores, Invading Homes...Mammoth Spectacle Never Before Filmed
title: King of the Jungle
